name: Astrochimp

bonus_points.notes: if Astrochimp is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Tunnel Rat
abilities.description: May Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Loyal
abilities.description: To Influence return all cubes on this card and place at least 1 more cube than was previously here.

reveal.name: Acrobatics
reveal.description: Gains ZeroBorn: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pickup or Drop.

sub.description: if in Possession of Briefcase
if in Possession of Artifact
if in Possession of Gun

quirks: Astrochimp counts as human (hey, they're 99% similar, close enough!).
tips: Artifact is in the Physics Lab and Briefcase is in Suite
Gun can be Manufactured in Print Shop by an Officer or acquired from another Character
Moves very quickly due to Tunnel Rat and Zero Born abilities.

name: Billionaire

bonus_points.notes: Fletcher escapes. (Nobody cares about the Billionare, just the cute space pup.)

abilities.name: Live Streams
abilities.description: If Jammers are OFF, Billionaire's and Fletcher's Sections act as if Lit and Cameras are on.

abilities.name: Rich
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed. When Activated, you may use a grey Bribe instead of your own. Grey Bribes only score if Billionaire Escapes.

reveal.name: Hollow Promises
reveal.description: Upon Reveal gain and/or return all three Grey Bribe tokens.

setup.notes: Billionaire starts with 3 grey Bribe tokens on his Character Card

sub.description: If not Colocated with Live Humans or Robots at Stationfall
If Fletcher and Billionaire are Colocated when Escaping

agenda.notes: Billionaire doesn't score any Possessed or unused Bribes

quirks: Billionaire doesn't score any unused bribes

Fletcher is an item that can be Picked Up, Dropped, Thrown, etc. Fletcher cannot be Attacked or Downed( he's got a retractable doggie space helment). But Fletcher can be Annihilated in the same way as other items
Grey Bribes can only be used if they are still on the Billionaire's card, not if it has been spent elsewhere already.
Billionaire and Fletcher are Collocated for end of the games scoring if they are Colocated when Escaping using the same component/ability
tips: Protect yourself with a Helmet and try to keep Jammers OFF so your Livestream Ability stays active.
After Revealing you can use your grey Bribes for extra Actions with other Characters.

name: Boarder

bonus_points.notes: if Boarder is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Breach
abilities.description: As an action may Remove an adjacent Lock.

abilities.name: Fugitive
abilities.description: No actions taken with or against this Character will make a player Suspect.

reveal.name: Missile
reveal.description: If Jammers OFF,  as an Action place 1 time marker on one unescaped Section. When time marker is resolved Damage that Section and Down all Colocated Characters. Only one inbound Missile at a time is allowed.

reveal.name: Extricate
reveal.description: Upon Reveal (even at Stationfall), flip the Rescue Ship to Pirate Ship. Pirate Ship will only rescue any Character Possessing the Briefcase (even if down)

setup.notes: Place Rescue Ship Token on the box next to Outer Space. Boarder starts with a Helmet, a Pistol and a Bludgeon on her Character Card

sub.description: If Boarder in Possession of Briefcase or it the Briefcase is in OuterSpace at Stationfall
for every Live Human in Outer Space at Stationfall

quirks: Boarder can win even if Guilty
Boarder scores double for Possessed Bribes
If an unlaunched Pod is targeted by Missile and then launches before Missile resolves, the Pod is Annihilated when Missile resolves
tips: Briefcase is in Suite
Your starting Items and indiference to Guilt allow you to Down Characters easily
If you Reveal early you can cause much mayhem with Missiles
If you Reveal late players won't know whether they can Escape in Outer Space or not, possibly giving you more Bribes
If Security is in the game, look out, as you count as Fugitive
board_modifications: At the start of the game there is a Rescue Ship "out there" than can hel humans Escape
Recue Ship (front) - At Scoring any Human in Outer Space Escapes
The player Revealing as Boarder flips this token over and the Rescue Ship turns out to be a Pirate Ship with another mission
Pirate Ship (back) -  At Scoring, any Character Possesing Briefcase in Outer Space Escapes

name: Botanist

bonus_points.notes: If Botanist is your BC and Fang Moss Escapes (no points if Botanist Escapes)

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Zero Born
abilities.description: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pickup or Drop.

reveal.name: Creatropism
reveal.description: During your Activation phase, if Fang Moss is not Possessed by a Live Character, Fang Moss may perform a Free Step or Annihilate a Down Colocated Human, Dropping its Items.

setup.notes: Place the Feed Me! Ability token next to the board near Hydroponics

main.description: for every Human Annihilated by Fang Moss

sub.description: If contaminated

quirks: Fang Moss is an Item. Any Character Possesing Fang Moss get access to the Feed Me! Action.
tips: Seek out Down Characters and feed Fang Moss.
Get a helmet. Get contaminated in Bio Lab.
Use your ZeroBorn for extra mobility.
After Reveal, Fang Moss can act in addition to your activation of another Character each turn.

name: Colonel

bonus_points.notes: if Colonel is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Paranoid
abilities.description: To Influence, the active player must have a Colocated Conspirator. Cannot be Bribed.

reveal.name: Mission First
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, return all of your cubes in Betrayal to your pool.

setup.notes: Connect Panic Pod to Quarters and add the indicated Lock and Pistol. Colonel starts with a Pistol

main.description: If at least one Contaminated NPC Escapes

quirks: Colonel's Paranoid ability makes him harder to influence
Colonel can not be Bribed
tips: You cam Contaminate Characters and Manufacture X-Secret in Bio Lab.
You can Release Project X with Officer in Bridge of Cryo Lab, alternatively by damaging Vault X or by causing Blackout.
board_modifications: Adding Panic Pod adds another Pod to the station. It start Locked with a Gun inside.
Any Character inside may use Timed Launch action. Note that like the four standard Pods, the Panic Pod requires Abandon Ship to launch

name: Consort

bonus_points.notes: if Consort is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Fast Talk
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked by Humans with Bludgeon in Lit Sections.

abilities.name: Mimic Frameup
abilities.description: After Downing a Human in a Lit Section,active player may choose another player who has a Colocated Conspirator to become Suspect instead..

reveal.name: Shapeshift Switch
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, if Live may swap locations with any Human or Robot NPC that is not Escaped or Annihilated. Characters also swap all non-Integral Possessions. Free Drop any Item exceeding the Item Limit.

sub.description: If not Colocated with Live Humans or Robots at Stationfall
if in Possession of Briefcase
If Secret Identity not Revealed until Station Fall

agenda.notes: Consort scores double for Possessed Bribes

quirks: Consort scores double for Possessed Bribes
Despite appareances, Consort is a Robot
tips: Briefcase is in Suite.
Remember that your Reveal Power swaps all items and Bribes as well as your location.
A well-timed Reveal late game can put you in the right place at the right time.
The later you Reveal, the more likely you'll get Bribed.
Consider using an NPC to secure the Briefcase and move towards escape (setting up a later swap).

name: Corpsicle

bonus_points.notes: if Corpsicle is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.description: Using Corpsicle's Kompromat will additionally give her a Bludgeon. Her Kompromat can be used even if Down, which will instantly Revive her.

abilities.name: Dying
abilities.description: May not be activated when Exhausted and gets no Free Pick Up or Drop when activated.

reveal.name: Last Gasp
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, Revive if Down or perform an Action.

setup.notes: Corpsicle starts Down and starts with a Helmet which is Integral (cannot be removed)

sub.description: If Possess Nanogel
If the X-Secret Escapes
If Project X is not released

quirks: Starts Down
Corpsicle's Helmet is Integral, therefore cannot be removed.
Using Corpsicle's Kompromat will additionally give her a Bludgeon and Revive her if Down.
tips: Corpsicle moves slowly on her own, but she can get crucial extra Steps by using Bribes or Kompromat.
You can Manufacture Nanogel in Nanofactory and Manufacture X-Secret in Bio Lab.
Prevent the release of Project X by keeping Officers out of Bridge and Cryo Lab.
If Medevac Pod is in the game, that may be your easiest Escape.

name: Counselor

bonus_points.notes: if Counselor is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Wormtongue
abilities.description: As an Action, move a cube on a Colocated Live Human's card to Betrayal.

reveal.name: Recorded Confessional
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, if Live choose a Colocated Human. All other Innocent players who have that Human as a Conspirator become Suspect.

setup.notes: Connect Shred Room to Therapy Garden with Lock on its Corridor

main.description: If you have more Kompromat than any other player at Stationfall
If you have the least Cubes in Betrayal Box at Stationfall

quirks: none
tips: Artifact is in the Physics Lab.
A well timed use of your Reveal Power can quickly make other players go from Innocent to Guilty if you can Transmit Evidence to Authorities using Array Control
Collect Kompromats
board_modifications: Adding Shred Room adds another Dark Section to the station. It starts Locked
Any Character inside it may use Data Mine: Pickup Kompromat from anywhere On Board

name: Cyborg

bonus_points.notes: if Cyborg is yor BC and it is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Uncanny
abilities.description: It takes two Activation discs for this Character to become Exhausted

abilities.name: Fugitive
abilities.description: No actions taken with or against this Character will make a player Suspect.

reveal.name: Brutal
reveal.description: May use a Bludgeon to Down a Helmeted Human, at which point Annihilate both the Bludgeon and the Helmet.

reveal.name: Slef-Repair
reveal.description: You may Activate Cyborg if Down and as your first action Revive Cyborg.

main.description: for each Character with Officer that is Down at Stationfall

agenda.notes: Cyborg can win even if Guilty

quirks: Cyborg can win even if Guilty
Cyborg is both Robot and Human, and acts as Human in the case of Hazards and Attacks
tips: You can always Down Characters without penalty but others can also Down you without penalty. Priorize Downing Human and Contaminated
Once revealed you will stop becoming Exhausted because other Players may not Activate you
You can Release Project X with Officer in Bridge of Cryo Lab, alternatively by damaging Vault X or by causing Blackout.
If Security is in the game, look out, as you count as Fugitive

name: Daredevil

bonus_points.notes: if Daredevil is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Pride
abilities.description: Daredevil cannot be Robed

abilities.name: Adrenaline
abilities.description: Daredevil is not Downed by Hazards. Step or Airlock into Section with Hazard is always Free.

reveal.name: Point Break
reveal.description: If you are Live, Possess a Helmet, and are Colocated with Rocket Wings at Stationfall, you Escape.

setup.notes: Place Jet-Pack in Physics Lab and place Rocket Wings Launch token under Outer Space Action text bubble

sub.description: if you are the only Human that Escapes
if in Possession of Artifact or is Contaminated

quirks: With Point Breack ability, Daredevil only needs to Posses a Helmet and be Colocated with Rocket Wings at Stationfall to Escape, she doesn't need to Possess Rocket Wings
Even if Daredevil can be in Outer Space without a Helemet she still need a Helmet to take the Rocket Wings Launch action
tips: Artifact is in the Physics Laband Contamination happens in Bio Lab.
Daredevil moves faster through Hazards and survives there without a Helmet
Prevent other Humans from Escaping by Downing them, releasing Project X, Damaging Pods and preventing Abandon Ship.
board_modifications: Rocket Wings is added as new iten on board that is useful for Escaping
Adding Rocket Wings Launch adds another Section Action to Outer Space
Rocket Wings Launch: If Possess Rocket Wings in Outer Space, Escape. Humans still needs to Possess a Helmet

name: Digital Assistant

bonus_points.notes: if Digital Assistant is yor BC and Escapes

abilities.name: AI
abilities.description: Can always and only do [Console Actions]. Characters Possessing [Digital Assistant data] have Officer for Section actions and "Abandon ship" for Pod launch.

abilities.name: Helpful
abilities.description: No player may have more than one influence cube on this Character.

reveal.name: Root Access
reveal.description: As an Action, perform an Action with any Robot that Possesses the Digital Assistant. Ignore Self-Preservation.

reveal.name: Trojan Horse
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, Copy Digital Assistant to an Unescaped Character that Possesses Evidence or XSecret.

setup.notes: Place Digital Assistant tokens by the general supply. Place Mainframe token on Mainframe Section text bubble. Place lockdown token under Console Actions

main.description: for every Escaped Robot that Possesses Digital Assistant
for every Offsite or Escaped Human that Possesses Digital Assistant
if at least two copies of Digital Assistant Escape

agenda.notes: Digital Assistant can win even if Guilty

quirks: Digital Assistant is Data, and cannot Possess items or Data
Digital Assistant can be Manufactured in Mainframe
Digital Assistant can win even if Guilty
Blackout prevents Digital Assistant from doing Console Actions
Digital Assistant can only perform Console Actions, even when no Character Manufactured you yet
tips: You are Data and will often need Conspirators to do your dirty work for you
Get someone to manufacture you in the Mainframe, keep Jammers OFF to Copy yourself to as many Characters as possible
After Reveal you can control any Robot that Possess you
Damage Physics Lab to avoid easy deletion
A well timed use of your Reveal Power may be just before someone Escapes with other Data
board_modifications: Adding Console Action Lockdown lets you add, move, or remove a Lock to any Corridor if not in Abandon Ship
Adding the Section Action "Manufacture Digital Assistant" in Mainframe gives any Character the ability to Manufacture Digital Assistant in Mainframe

name: Doctor (Hyde)

bonus_points.notes: if Doctor is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.description: Has two identity cards

reveal.name: ZipGun
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, gain a Gun

setup.notes: Doctor has 2 Identity Cards, Shuffle them in as normal before dealing the Identity cards. Starts with X-Secret

sub.description: if in Possession of Briefcase
if Escaped Live in a Pod with a Down Human

agenda.notes: Hyde scores double for Bribes Possessed by Doctor

quirks: Doctor has 2 Identity cards. Each Identity card has its own Agenda
Doctor may be the PC of two players. A player trying to Bribe or use Kompromat on such a PC must choose one of the two players to accept or refuse. Both players become Suspect if Kompromat is refused
Hyde scores double for Bribes Possessed by Doctor
Both Players with Doctor as their PC may activate and act with Doctor
tips: Briefcase is in Suite
The later you Reveal, the more likely you'll get Bribed.
A well timed Reveal will allow you to Down a Human with you newly acquired Gun just before you Escape with their body

name: Doctor (Jekyll)

bonus_points.notes: if Doctor is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.description: Has two identity cards

reveal.name: Fake Artifact
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, unless Possesed by PC, Artifact moves to Doctor even if it was Annihilated

setup.notes: Doctor has 2 Identity Cards, Shuffle them in as normal before dealing the Identity cards. Starts with X-Secret

sub.description: if Contaminated
if in Possession of Artifact

main.description: if News and Authorities do not have Evidence at Stationfall

agenda.notes: Jeckyll scores normally any Bribes Possessed by Doctor

quirks: Doctor has 2 Identity cards. Each Identity card has its own Agenda
Doctor may be the PC of two players. A player trying to Bribe or use Kompromat on such a PC must choose one of the two players to accept or refuse. Both players become Suspect if Kompromat is refused
Jeckyll scores double for Bribes Possessed by Doctor
Both Players with Doctor as their PC may activate and act with Doctor
tips: Artifact is in the Physics Lab, but you can also get it by Revealing if no PC Possess it.
Get Contaminated in Bio Lab
Keep Jammers ON to prevent the Evidence from reaching the News or the Authorities easily

name: Drones

bonus_points.notes: Drones can not be anyones BC

abilities.name: Disassemble
abilities.description: As an Action, can Down self to Repair a Colocated Section or Robot.

abilities.name: Remote Control
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed, Influenced, or Activated directly. As a Console Action Characters may perform an Action with any Live Drone.

setup.notes: Drones have no Identity Card. Place Remote control token under Console Actions Actions. Each Drone starts with an Integral Bludgeon

quirks: Drones have no Identity Card
Drones are never Activated and therefore can never Free Pick Up or Drop
Drones can perform Actions and may Possess Items and Data
Drones Bludgeons are Integral and can not be removed from the Character Card
Using Console action Remote Control is the only way to act with Drones. Unless Digital Assistant is in the game
tips: Drones are a useful way to Down Characters since they always Possess a Bludgeon
Drones are useful for Repairing Sections
board_modifications: Add Remote Control action under Console actions. Giving the players the possibility to: Perform an Action with any one Drone

name: Engineer

bonus_points.notes: if Engineer is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Down Robot.

reveal.name: Overload
reveal.description: Upon Reveal place a time marker in any Section. When it resolves Damage that Section.

setup.notes: Place Reactor Token on Reactor Text bubble

main.description: if Antimatter detonates On Board before Stationfall
if Innocent, but may win even if Guilty

quirks: If an unlaunched Pod is targeted by Overload and then launches before Time maker resolves, the Pod if Annihilated when the Time maker resolves
tips: Anyone can arm Antimatter by removing it from Magnetic Containment
Officers can arm the Antimatter by triggering Slef-Destruct from Bridge
You can Decontaminate Characters in Tanks, or just Down them since you're indifferent to Guilt
board_modifications: Addin Reactor changes the state of Reactor
It cannot be Damaged with Bludgeon. However if it is Damaged by other means, add Asphyxiation here and in connected through corridor Sections. Asphyxiation does not move through vents

name: Exile

bonus_points.notes: if Exile is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Fast Talk
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked by Humans with Bludgeon in Lit Sections.

abilities.name: Hacker
abilities.description: May perform a Free Console Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.  If Jammers are OFF may perform Console Actions in any Section.

reveal.name: Blod from a Stone
reveal.description: After using Kompromat on an NPC, return it to your hand.

reveal.name: Tradecraft
reveal.description: As an Action with Exile, discard two Kompromat from your hand and take a previously used NPC's Kompromat into your hand.

sub.description: for each Possessed Kompromat of Escaped Characters
if Exile has Evidence and News does not

tips: Pick up as much Kompromats as possible
After Reveal, Kompromats can be used multiple times on NPCs
Help any Character that you have Kompromat for to Escape
Evidence can be Manufactured in Security Station and can be Deleted in Physics Lab
Keep Jammers ON to prevent the Evidence from reaching the News

name: Inspector

bonus_points.notes: if Inspector is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Investigator
abilities.description: Can Pick Up Kompromat or Manufacture Data from adjacent Sections.

abilities.name: Badge
abilities.description: May Rob Items as if in Possession of a Gun.

reveal.name: Offshore Sheanigans
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, regain your Bribe if it has been used.

setup.notes: Flip Hail Mary Pod to Inspector Shuttle side up

sub.description: if in Possession of Briefcase
if News does not

agenda.notes: Inspector Scores doubled for Possesed Bribes

quirks: Inspector Scores doubled for Possesed Bribes
tips: Briefcase is in Suite
Evidence can be Manufactured in Security Station and sent using Array Control or by Escaping with it at Stationfall
Turn Jammers OFF to send Evidence to any Character
Your Shuttle does not require Abandon Ship to launch
The later you Reveal, the more likely you'll get Bribed.
board_modifications: The Inspector Shuttle must be Occupied by Inspector or Live Character with Jury Rig to launch

name: Legal

bonus_points.notes: if Legal is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Process Server
abilities.description: As an Action, Manufacture NDA into the Possession of all Colocated Humans and Robots.

abilities.name: Lawyer Up
abilities.description: As an action, change a Player's Innocent or Guilty status to Suspect if Colocated with that Player's PC.

reveal.name: Fine Print
reveal.description: You may Activate NPCs Possessing the NDA.

reveal.name: Hardcopy
reveal.description: As an Action, any Character Colocated with Legal can Manufacture a copy of the NDA.

setup.notes: Flip Alcatraz, Houdini, and McQueen so the arrow side is down. Place the NDA tokens by the general supply

main.description: for each Human that Escapes with NDA
if no Human Escape or all Escaped Humans have NDA
if the Evidence does not Escape
for each Suspect (not Guilty) PC at Stationfall

quirks: NDA is Data, Legal does not Possess NDA, but can Manufacture it into the Possession of Colocated Characters
Characters Possesing NDA may not Copy, Delete, Deliver, or be Roobed of Data

Legal may still Manufacture NDA into Downed Characters' Possession. (Imagine Legal explaining all of the terms and conditions to the incapacitated victim...then lifting their lifeless handprint to sing the self-binding corporate smart-contract.)
tips: Acquiring and using Kompromat is a good way to create Suspect Players
Your Influence Limit is low but Fine Print can help if you Reveal
Damage Security Station since Evidence can be Manufactured there
Prevent any form of Escape that does not requiere an NDA
The NDA can only be personally Manufactured to or with Colocated Characters, so keep Legal Live if possible
board_modifications: The Pods Alcatraz, Houdini, and McQueen now Requiere Abdandon Ship and all Live Occupants Possesing NDA to launch

name: Maintenance Clones

bonus_points.notes: for every Clone that Escapes. +1 point if all 3 Clones Escape

abilities.name: Zero Born
abilities.description: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pickup or Drop.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Down Robot.

reveal.name: Go Go Go!
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, you may immediately perform an Action with each Clone.

sub.description: if at least two Clones Escapes
if News ends with Evidence

quirks: When activating Maintenance Clones you may perform Actions with a single Clone per turn
Each Clone has an Item Limit of 2 (put both Items in the same slot)
Each Clone can Possess its own Data Types and does not automatically share with other Clones. Place Possessed Data and Items on their indicated slots
You can still Activate and Renegociate with Maintenace Clones as long as at least one of them has not Escaped or been Annihilated
tips: Maintenance Clones can move very quickly
Take advantage of being in three different locations
Evidence can be Manufactured in Security Station and sent using Array Control
Turn Jammers OFF to send Evidence to any Character

name: Medical

bonus_points.notes: if Medical is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Emergency Response
abilities.description: As an Action, may Revive a Human. Step or Airlock into Section with Down Human is always Free.

abilities.name: Helpful
abilities.description: No player may have more than one influence cube on this Character.

reveal.name: Haywire
reveal.description: Gains a Bludgeon

main.description: if no Down Human on Board at Stationfall
for each star reached on the tracker on the Character Card

agenda.notes: Move tracker on slot for every: Human Revival performed by Medical and Cubed moved to Betrayal upon Medical's Reveal

quirks: Medical marker starts at 0
Use Medical marker to keep track of Revives and number of cubes sent to Betrayal for scoring purposes
Medical can not revive Unhelmeted Humans in Hazards
Free Steps from Emergency Response can be chained gained
tips: The more Characters that are Down, the more chances you have to score points and move around quicker
The later you Reveal, the more chances you have to gain Points from other Players Influence Cubes when Revealing
Free Step can be used even when you do not choose to revive anyone

name: Microbiologist

bonus_points.notes: if Microbiologist is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Loyal
abilities.description: To Influence return all cubes on this card and place at least 1 more cube than was previously here.

reveal.name: Infect
reveal.description: As an Action, Contaminate a Colocated Human or Robot.  If they have no empty item slots, they drop an Item of your choice.  Humans and Robots can never have more than one contamination token.

main.description: for every Contaminated Character that Escapes

tips: Use your Reveal power or Bio Lab to Contaminate Characters
Manufacture X-Secret in Bio Lab and Copy it to other Characters
Trigger Abandon Ship using an Officer on Bridge, Damaging Power Section, or releasing Project X
You can launch multiple Occuped Pods from Bridge with Officer

name: Operative

bonus_points.notes: if Operative is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: EMP Burst
abilities.description: Sabotage Operative's Section, Down all Robots in it and Delete all Colocated Data.

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

reveal.name: Claymore
reveal.description: Peek at, then place 3 trap markers face-Down in 3 different Sections. Flip each marker after a Human, Robot, or Monster enters the Section and Down them if it is the trap. Traps never trigger Suspicion, Guilt or Self-Preservation.

reveal.name: Nerve Gas Grenades
reveal.description: As an Action with Operative, place Gas in Operative’s Section or a Section she can Throw to.

setup.notes: Place the 3 trap tokens close to Operative's Character Card

main.description: if the Evidence does not Escape

tips: Keep Jammers ON to prevent Data Copying
Delete Data and Down Robots using you EMP Burst
Using Kompromat on PCs at critical moment is a good way to make them Suspect
You can Decontaminate Characters in Tanks
Use your Reveal Powers wisely to Down Characters

name: Security

bonus_points.notes: if Security is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: May only Attack Fugitives, Monsters or non-Innocent PCs. May not Sabotage

abilities.name: Armored
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked or Robbed with Bludgeon.

reveal.name: Authorized Force
reveal.description: Lose Peacekeeper

setup.notes: Security starts with an Integral Gun (can not be removed)

main.description: per Down Fugitive, Monster, or non-Innocent Player PC On Board at Stationfall
per Down Human with Bludgeon or Gun On Board at Stationfall

sub.description: if both Briefcase + Artifact do not Escape

tips: You are hard to Rob so Artifact and Briefcase are safest with you
Once you Reveal you can Down any Character, and then plant a Bludgeon on them
Acquiring and using Kompromat is a good way to create Suspect Players
You can Release Project X with Officer in Bridge of Cryo Lab
Boarder and Cyborg are Fugitives
Until you Reveal, Peacekeeper prevents you from Attacking or Sabotaging, but you can still 'Rob' items (confiscating/securing them)

name: Station Chief

bonus_points.notes: if Station Chief is your BC and is not Live at Stationfall

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Pride
abilities.description: Cannot be Robbed

reveal.name: Forceful Presence
reveal.description: At the start of Station Chief's Activation phase you may perform a Free Basic Action with a Colocated NPC or with an NPC Officer anywhere.

setup.notes: Connect Medevac Pod to Forward Airlocks

main.description: per every other Human that Escapes

sub.description: per NPC with the Officer ability that Escapes

main.description: if Station Chief is On Board and Live at Stationfall

tips: Trigger Abandon Ship as quickly as possible with Officer on Bridge, Damaging Power Sections, or releasing Project X
You can launch multiple Occupied Pods from Bridge with Officer
If you can Drag a Down Human to Medevac Pod, you can launch it without Abandon ship
board_modifications: The Medevac Pod must be Occupied by a Down Human to launch. Abandon Ship is no requiered to launch

name: Stowaway

bonus_points.notes: if Stowaway is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Tunnel Rat
abilities.description: May Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Hacker
abilities.description: May perform a Free Console Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.  If Jammers are OFF may perform Console Actions in any Section.

reveal.name: Secret Cache
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, you or one of your Conpirators gains a Helmet.

sub.description: if Escape with Evidence and no other Character does

quirks: Stoaway's pawn starts on her Character card
Stoaway's first ever Action must be to Step into any Dark Section and may not be interacted with until then
tips: Evidence can be Manufactured in Security Station and X-Secret in Bio Lab
Transmit Data using Array Control or by Escaping with it at Stationfall
Turn Jammers OFF to Copy Data and to use your Hacker Ability
Stop others with Data from Escaping by Downing them or Step them into Physics Lab.

name: Stranger

bonus_points.notes: if Stranger is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Uncanny
abilities.description: It takes two Activation discs for this Character to become Exhausted

reveal.name: Homework
reveal.description: Upon Reveal, you may Reveal your BC and perform one Action with that Character.

reveal.name: Enigma
reveal.description: If Schrödinger Reveal as Stranger, do not discard any card(s) (retain them as Bonus Characters).  YYY If Schrödinger Reveal as Stranger then lose Uncanny.

main.description: if your Secret Identity is not revealed until Stationfall
if Live and Colocated with a Bonus Character of yours at Stationfall

tips: Focus mainly on achieving your BC's condition and keeping the Stranger close to them
If you want your BC to survive, trigger Abandon Ship as quickly as possible either with Officer on Bridge, Damaging Power Sections, or releasing Project X
Due to your low point cap you should actively deduce and interfere with your opponent's Agendas if possible

name: Telepathic Rat

bonus_points.notes: if Telephatic Rat is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Perform an Action with a Colocated Unhelmeted Human, ignoring Self-Preservation. May only perform Telepathy Actions.

abilities.name: Paranoid
abilities.description: To Influence, the active player must have a Colocated Conspirator. Cannot be Bribed.

reveal.name: My Precious
reveal.description: Other players may not Throw, Airlock, or Drop you. You may still be Given to Colocated Characters.

main.description: for each Down Human or Robot Colocated with Telepathic Rat at Stationfall

sub.description: for each Possessed Kompromat of Colocated Down Characters

main.description: if Telepathic Rat is Collocated with Artifact at Stationfall
if Telepathic Rat is Collocated with Briefcase at Stationfall

agenda.notes: Rat can win even if Guilty

quirks: Rat is an Item, it can be Picked Up, Dropped, Thrown, Etc
Rat starts Contaminated, but can be decontaminated (or recontaminated) normally
Rat cannot Possess Items or Data
Rat cannot be Attacked or ever become Down
Rat can win even if Guilty
Rat's Paranoid ability makes it harder to influence
Rat cannot be Bribed
Rat stats Contaminated even though it will not Possess Items
tips: Artifact is in the Physics Lab and Briefcase is in Suite
Beware of Annihilation of being Possesed by any Character that can potentially Escape
You're indifferent to Guilt, so you can Down Characters indiscriminately
Aim to end a Section with many Down Characters at Stationfall
Your Reveal power prevents you fron being left in an empty Section or Outer Space
Helmets are the Rat's enemy; find ways to dispose if them

name: Troubleshooter

bonus_points.notes: if Troubleshooter is your BC and Escapes

abilities.name: Tunnel Rat
abilities.description: May Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Down Robot.

reveal.name: Talk them through it
reveal.description: During your turn, if Troubleshooter is Live, your Conspirators move and act as though they have Jury Rig and Tunnel Rat.

setup.notes: Connect Cargo Claw to forward Airlocks. Troubleshooter starts with a Bludgeon

main.description: If Antimatter is not Armed at Stationfall
If Project X is not released
if no Sections are Damaged at Stationfall
for each Live Robot at Stationfall

tips: Your Reveal power is very useful to allow your Conspirators to Repair Damaged Sections
Try to keep Characters out of Bridge, Cryo Lab and Magnetic Containment preventing releasing Project X and arming Antimatter
board_modifications: Cargo Claw enables any Character to do the action Grip in this Section
Grip: Pick Up an Item in Outer Space or Down a Character in Outer Space
